item.title: UScript tools
item.author: invalid@example.com (mr.s-d)
item.dc:creator: mr.s-d
item.content:encoded:
It's come to my attention that a number of links on the tools page are no longer valid, so the list of tools needs to be updated.
If there's any program that you find to be a useful aid to UnrealScript programming and want to see it listed on the tools page, post a link to it in this thread and I'll check it out and put it on the updated tools list.

item.title: Tutorial suggestions
item.author: invalid@example.com (mr.s-d)
item.dc:creator: mr.s-d
item.content:encoded:
Time to put your thinking caps on lads, is there anything that you'd like a tutorial about? Is there anything you'd like to write a tutorial about? If so, post it here for the former or contact me about the latter

BTW I've a few ideas up my sleeve already, mostly just some rehashing of pre-existing code to make a tute.

item.title: Can I translate Tutorials?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Raven)
item.dc:creator: Raven
item.content:encoded:
I have a question: Can I translate (to Polish) some of basic tutorials (about messaging/canvas/sounds/#exec etc.)? Of course, I'll write that this is only translation, original author, and link to original tutorial.

PS. Sorry for my horrible english.

item.title: Tutorials
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lemoni)
item.dc:creator: Lemoni
item.content:encoded:
i get page not found when trying to acces some of the tuts. as i have copies of certain tuts can i post them on my site with the following header?
Oridginaly displayed at CHiMERiC

item.title: CHiMERiC is now at http://www.unrealscript.com/
item.author: invalid@example.com (ca)
item.dc:creator: ca
item.content:encoded:
It has come to my attention that many people are still accessing CHiMERiC through the old PlanetUnreal address. We are no longer hosted by PlanetUnreal, and can now be accessed at http://www.unrealscript.com/ so please update your bookmarks or whatnot.

I asked PU to take down the site a week ago but it is still up - now you can get a glimpse at why we are no longer hosted there.

item.title: Mouse
item.author: invalid@example.com (UnrealPro)
item.dc:creator: UnrealPro
item.content:encoded: How do I display the mouse cursor during a game(like in the orders menu) in Ut1?

item.title: REad this if u cannot find the tutorials...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dandeloreon1984)
item.dc:creator: Dandeloreon1984
item.content:encoded:
After emailing the admin of chimeric requesitng for an update on his site and getting no reply i decided to go ahead and get a quick list of links made to the tutorials so people can access them with little hassle...

General
  • Unrealscript Language Reference
  • Beginner's Guide to Unrealscript ...

REad this if u cannot find the tutorials...

item.title: [Mod]Mod in progress, looking for an extra hand
item.author: invalid@example.com (mindcry)
item.dc:creator: mindcry
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I'm the lead coder for UT40k (ut2003/2004 warhammer 40k modification, http://www.ut40k.com/ ) and we're currently looking for more experienced coders other help is welcome too...

We have a WORKING mod, with lots of stuff so far, if you're interested, my aim is bloodwars, and my msn messenger name is bloodwars@onebox.com (i wont get e-mail sent to that account btw). We can talk, and i can give you access to our team forums and a current build to test and...

[Mod]Mod in progress, looking for an extra hand

item.title: 3d math problems
item.author: invalid@example.com (R0j5)
item.dc:creator: R0j5
item.content:encoded:
I'm trying to get an actor's forward speed (acceleration) to put into either a float or int variable.
My trouble is in using the actors acceleration and using it's rotation to get the actors speed relative to the view location. Any help on how to do this?

item.title: Voting System tute?
item.author: invalid@example.com (mr.s-d)
item.dc:creator: mr.s-d
item.content:encoded: Just wondering if there'd be any demand for me to do a write a tutorial on the Democracy voting system I released rather a while back...?

item.title: How to make a HUD mutator
item.author: invalid@example.com (KillerMonk)
item.dc:creator: KillerMonk
item.content:encoded: well, more how can I add it without making a new game type. It was done with the team beacon mutator, but that just draws little icons, I'm wondering how I could change the whole HUD w/o having to create a whole new game type...

item.title: ???Seeking Projectile???
item.author: invalid@example.com (FrAgEdFragEd)
item.dc:creator: FrAgEdFragEd
item.content:encoded:
??OMG What do I dooo?? OMG aaauuu, Sh*t ?? Sh*t?? O mG !!

Ok, I have been working on a little mod. And question lies with seeking projectiles. I hoping that one can create a projectile that seeks only certain actors that have a certain item they have pickup and are using in the game. Now the actor when he has this item has many different characteristics, which I have tried to use to get the projectile to go after or "Seek and Destroy!" This is a little hard to explain so bare with...

???Seeking Projectile???

item.title: Help a UScripter in need
item.author: invalid@example.com (LedZep)
item.dc:creator: LedZep
item.content:encoded:
allright, a couple of questions:

How do i tell a bot to go to a specific vector (and look at a specific rotator but thats optional) and stay there for a specific amount of time?

how do i get a bot to support a specific pawn, i think its:
var pawn P;
var bot B;
B.supportingplayer = P;
but im not sure.

and last, how do i tell a bot to hunt down a specific pawn (not only attitude or setenemy but actually HUNT DOWN the pawn)

i hope someone can help me with that.

thanks in...

Help a UScripter in need

item.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cookie)
item.dc:creator: Cookie
item.content:encoded:
Howdy,

Badlands is a new total conversion mod for UT set in the wild, wild, West! And we're looking for some more hands around camp. This isn't just a "cool idea", we're a serious team approaching our first beta release, scheduled for early this summer!

In fact, you can read a great interview about the mod at MPZ. And then you can check out our site here. We've got...

Wanted: Dead or Alive!

item.title: hud mutator question
item.author: invalid@example.com (lofantasy)
item.dc:creator: lofantasy
item.content:encoded:
greets, i just had a question on how to add info to the hud like hte scoreboard. rather then having to hit f1, its on the screen.
as part of my mutator, i want it to display info about the other players, but cant seem to get htat to work. i got it working up to the point of displaying text, (off a server) but it doesnt show info like hte players names or anything.
any pointers on how i can do that?

an a second question. when using the MutatorTakeDamage, do i set it as a "simulated...

hud mutator question

item.title: Random Time trigger
item.author: invalid@example.com (Fear the Beard)
item.dc:creator: Fear the Beard
item.content:encoded:
Hi folks, seeing as there is a Timed Trigger available, I was wondering, has anyone made a Random Time Trigger?

I would love to make one myself, but since I have no knowledge of coding these things I thought I'd ask here

item.title: Making a ScriptedPawn
item.author: invalid@example.com (BondJamesBond)
item.dc:creator: BondJamesBond
item.content:encoded:
Hello all!!

I am making a terrorist that expands ScriptedPawn. I am expanding from ScriptedPawn because my mod's GameType is a variation of CoopGame. I am modeling the code after the SkaarjTrooper and Titan. I have the following questions:

--How do I make him stay where he is, until called to change positions by another actor? When he sees me, he immediately starts to follow me.

--I want him to shoot at me when he sees me!! He has a gun, but he freakin doesn't use it!!...

Making a ScriptedPawn

item.title: Can somebody please help?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dexter13)
item.dc:creator: Dexter13
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
i have created a gun (with code, model, texture, etc.) for U.T, and everything compiles.
when i summon it in the game nothing appears although i can walk over it, and pick it up. no gun is displayed when i am holding it, but i can still fire.

does anyone have any ideas as to what i am doing wrong?
